divs: sighting detailsi live in chula vista, california, a suburb of san diego, california. i woke up suddenly at 1:32 a.m. on 02\06\06. i decided to go onto my apartment balcony, which faces west, to have a cigarette. the sky was clear, with few, scattered stratus clouds. i noticed a large, bright light in the western sky, which i first thought was an airplane, but could not hear any sound. i then noticed the unusual colors emanating from it: red, green, blue yellow and white. it was extremely bright, brighter than any stars i could see, and it looked as if it were pulsating. i waited to see if it would turn north or south, like the planes in the area usually do, but it did not. it continued into the western sky, climbing higher into the sky. i felt as if i were paralyzed; i could not stop staring at it. then i noticed it move left, then right, in a perfect, straight line. i thought i was crazy. i decided to use a tree as a "marker" to to see if it were really moving like that, so i moved my head so the object was just to the left of a tree located about 50 yards in front of me and 3 stories down. the object moved again, then back. i looked at the surrounding sky and noticed a smaller, star-like object to the north of this object, but with the same probing lights, heading westward as well, very high in the sky. so high that it looked like a small star, but moving very fast. i sat and watched these objects until they were completely out of view, because for some reason, i felt uncomfortable going back in my apartment until these things were gone. when i could no longer see them, i went back inside. it was 2:26 a.m. i stood perplexed and wondered if these things were planes, how would i be able to sit and watch their ascent for almost an hour?! i am still puzzled. i tried to film them, but my camera could not pick up the image. i have had other sightings and do have some pics of past sightings, if interested. thank you, jennifer f. chula vista, ca
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Chula Vista
There was one other sighting in Chula Vista on or around February 6th 2006
Summary: Large, extremely bright light in center with pulsating lights
